name: SoulChef
description:
As a Chief in HELL, become the owner of the most renowned restaurant in all layers of hell with your secret recipe!

Demon Reporter : “A new rising chief is in hell, his food is really truly something otherworldly. Every demon in the layers of hell has been asking, what could be the secret recipe AND does he have what it takes to become the new best chief in HELL” 

Human Reporter: “A demonic monster has opened a gate from hell here on earth slaughtering by the millions. We do not know his intent, but humanity will fight back”

_____________________________________________

How to Play:

1. Interact with the food dispensers to cook and serve it to your beloved customers!

2. You MUST keep the Flame level nice and high for these dispensersto function!

3. Food Vendors Costs Souls, collect these SOULS by putting humans to sleep!

4. If Screen Turns Black, try refreshing the page!

_____________________________________________

Controls:

- Interact: 'E'

- Movement: 'W,A,S,D'

- Aim: Your Mouse

- Attack: Left Mouse Button

_____________________________________________

Known Issues that will be addressed:

- Black Screen when switched tabs (Refresh the page for now)

- Collision Clipping on few objects
